attributes.action: accomodate British born citizens council accomodations before immigrants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I know of hundreds of immigrants in the UK that have been in the country less than a year and already have council accomodation, whilst british born citizens who have paid their taxes since they left school are told they are not a priority and are forced to pay extorsionate rates in private renting.

Nor all citizens can afford to buy their own homes and we are looking after every other citizen except our own.
